title: Submissions Guidelines
Purpose: This section outlines the rules and restrictions regarding the content that users can submit through the Services.

title: FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: This section explains the Family Sharing feature, detailing eligibility, responsibilities of the Organizer, and sharing of subscriptions among family members.

title: Purchase Sharing
Purpose: This section describes how Family Sharing’s Purchase Sharing feature operates and the obligations of the Organizer regarding transactions initiated by family members.

title: Ask to Buy
Purpose: This section defines the Ask to Buy feature, which allows Organizers to approve transactions for family members under a certain age.

title: Family Member changes
Purpose: This section addresses the implications for content access when a Family member leaves or is removed from the Family.

title: Family Sharing Rules
Purpose: This section stipulates the rules governing membership in a Family, including frequency of changes and eligibility requirements.

title: Limitation of Liability:
Purpose: This section outlines the limitations on liability for the Licensor regarding potential losses or damages incurred by the user.

title: Export Restrictions:
Purpose: This section prohibits the export or re-export of the Licensed Application except as permitted by U.S. laws and identifies specific restrictions.

title: U S Government End Users
Purpose: This section clarifies the licensing terms for U.S. government end users regarding the Licensed Application and related documentation.

title: Governing Law:
Purpose: This section specifies the governing laws and jurisdiction applicable to the agreement between the user and Apple.
